fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: Mode
semantics.description: Choose the mode for playing. Numbers will be filled in automatically, words need to be given.

fields.label: Words or phrases
fields.description: Use one line for each word and phrase.

semantics.label: Visuals
semantics.description: You can customize the visual appearance here.

fields.label: Selected/unselected a field
fields.description: Sound to play when a field is selected or unselected.

fields.label: Completed row or column
fields.description: Sound to play when the user has selected a complete row or column.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Shuffle on retry
fields.description: If checked, the words/phrases/numbers will be shuffled on retry.

fields.label: Set joker
fields.description: Will place an unturnable joker in the center of the board if its size is odd.

fields.label: Height limit mode
fields.description: Decide if you want to limit the board height to fit the visible area. Automatic detection may not be perfect depending on your website's setup, e.g. if it has sticky top navigation bars. Good custom values are hard to set manually.

fields.label: Height limit
fields.description: Maximum height of the board in pixels.

semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
semantics.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
